attributes.additional_details: The 30 million British drivers are the backbone of the economy. Without them, even public transport would have no links. There is more death from accidents in the home than from any cause on the UK's roads yet the costly and avaricious Road Safety Industry profits from, hampers and penalises them and government over-taxes them. We want Government to review all road safety policy with the aim of less prosecution, true road safety and less profit from it.
